Mobile/Tablet - Sign In/Up Item Lead Gen Pop up Content 00 Days 00 Hours 00 Min 00 Sec HALLOWEEN ACTIVITIES September 25 — October 31 SPLASH & PLAY INTO SPOOKY GOOD TIMES Just one night of Halloween isn’t enough. This year, make sure to gather your whole pack—and their costumes—and join us for Howl-O-Ween at Great Wolf Lodge Naples, FL. All throughout October, we’re featuring spooky special treats, games, and Halloween activities to celebrate the season. Don’t miss the most frightfully fun Halloween events near you. October 11 – October 31 DON'T MISS OUR HOWL-O-WEEN EVENTS Included with your stay. May vary by lodge. For the most-up-to-date listing of events offered, check out our mobile app . Monster Bash Dance Party Hit the dance floor and celebrate with your pack—costumes welcome! Howl-O-Ween Crafts Grab one of our Howl-o-Ween craft kits and let your imagination run wild Boo Bingo Get ready to yell "BOO!" In this spooky twist on the classic game Howl-O-Ween Trivia Show off your knowledge of all things Halloween in a round of trivia Ghoulish Games Join the fun playing our Pin the Wolf Ears on Mr. Bones or Feed the Monster games Monster Bash Dance Party Hit the dance floor and celebrate with your pack—costumes welcome! Howl-O-Ween Crafts Grab one of our Howl-o-Ween craft kits and let your imagination run wild Boo Bingo Get ready to yell "BOO!" In this spooky twist on the classic game Howl-O-Ween Trivia Show off your knowledge of all things Halloween in a round of trivia Ghoulish Games Join the fun playing our Pin the Wolf Ears on Mr. Bones or Feed the Monster games TRICK-OR-TREAT TRAIL Join us for a not-so-scary trail offering more treats than tricks. ENJOY FA-BOO-LOUS DRINKS Try our themed drinks, including Halloween cocktails for adults and mocktails for the little ones. Learn More The below is loaded in greatwolf.footer-v2 since it needs to load at the bottom FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS What is Howl-O-Ween? Howl-O-Ween is Great Wolf Lodge’s annual Halloween celebration, where the lodge transforms into a spook-tacular treat-filled experience filled with games, crafts, and special events that only happen during the month of October. What activities are included during Howl-O-Ween?​ During Howl-O-Ween, your family can participate in the following free activities as part of your stay:​ Trick-or-treat trail for kids with free treats, Monster Bash Dance Party, Howl-O-Ween Spooktacular singalong, a variety of Halloween-themed games like Bingo and Trivia, customized Halloween arts and crafts, and more. Is there an additional cost for these activities? No — all of our Howl-O-Ween special events and activities are included with your stay. Are costumes required? Not at all, but we encourage families to bring their Halloween costumes to the celebration. Do I need to make reservations in advance for any of these activities? No. All these activities are included with your reservation, but certain events happen at set times, so check the in-lodge activities upon arrival to plan your family time in advance. Mobile/Tablet - Sign In/Up Item Lead Gen Pop up Content OUR NAPLES RESORT SPLASH INTO THE ULTIMATE FAMILY VACATION No matter what the weather outside is doing, our resort at Great Wolf Lodge Naples, FL keeps the indoor water park fun flowing 365 days per year. Splash, swim, and slide with the whole family, then dry off and head into our adventure park to delight in dry-land attractions such as our immersive MagiQuest adventure game, arcade games and much more. Kids will love the assortment of entertainment included in your stay—from yoga and arts & crafts projects to a dance party and story time that wrap up the day—and be sure to keep your camera handy for a photo op with the Great Wolf Kids characters who have been known to roam around the resort. Whether you're planning a special occasion or just need a quick escape, our Great Wolf Lodge resort provides top-notch service that creates memories of a lifetime. The below is loaded in greatwolf.footer-v2 since it needs to load at the bottom Dining/Events Hours API Naples, FL Great Wolf Lodge South Florida opened in September 2024 and became the brand's 22nd resort in North America. Boasting 500 family-friendly suites and a sprawling 100,000-square-foot indoor water park, it promises endless adventure for visitors of all ages in Florida. Explore our Naples Lodge The below is loaded in greatwolf.footer-v2 since it needs to load at the bottom The below is loaded in greatwolf.footer-v2 since it needs to load at the bottom Dining/Events Hours API JUMP IN THE RESORT AMENITIES With our massive indoor water park, amazing attractions, complimentary daily events and activities, and delicious dining options, there’s no shortage of ways to play. ALWAYS INCLUDED WITH YOUR STAY Access to water park from open to close Life jackets and towels in the water park Family fun with our lineup of daily events Sanitary spaces with CleanPLUS Experience WiFi throughout the lodge The below is loaded in greatwolf.footer-v2 since it needs to load at the bottom Dining/Events Hours API STEP INSIDE OUR SIGNATURE SUITES Whether you book a Standard Suite for up to six guests, a Themed Suite featuring one-of-a-kind accommodations, or our spacious Premium Suites for larger packs, we've got you covered. View All Suites View All Suites standard Family Suite Suite featuring two queen beds as well as a living area. 4 -6 2 1 Learn More themed Wolf Den Suite Accessible Bathtub Florida Special suite featuring a Northwoods-themed sleeping area. 4 -6 2 1 Learn More themed KidCabin Suite Suite featuring a Wiley's Clubhouse sleeping area. 5 -7 3 1 Learn More premium Grizzly Bear Suite Standard suite features a king bed in a master bedroom, two queens in a second bedroom and a full-size sofa sleeper in the main area. 6 -8 3 2 Learn More The below is loaded in greatwolf.footer-v2 since it needs to load at the bottom Our luxurious guest rooms are spacious and inviting, providing the perfect respite after a day of play. We have accommodations for groups small or large with special features like patios, sleeper sofas, themed sleeping areas, and/or accessible bathrooms. You can customize your stay to fit your family's needs. Room amenities such as a coffee maker, a mini fridge, internet access, and HDTVs are standard, ensuring you have everything you need at our Naples, FL resort for the ultimate family getaway. The below is loaded in greatwolf.footer-v2 since it needs to load at the bottom Dining/Events Hours API SATISFY YOUR PACK WITH FOOD FOR EVERY APPETITE We offer delicious dining options to satisfy your pack for every meal of the day—and tasty snacks in between splashes. View All Restaurants View All Restaurants The below is loaded in greatwolf.footer-v2 since it needs to load at the bottom The variety of dining options for kids and adults located throughout our Naples, FL resort can cater to any appetite: enjoy a family meal of shareable plates, pizza fresh from the oven, a casual poolside picnic, and more. Parents will appreciate our coffee and bar outlets for when it's time to fuel up or unwind, and there are sweet treats to grab and go whenever the craving strikes. The Great Wolf Lodge mobile app offers contactless food ordering so you can plan ahead and have your food ready for pick-up exactly when you want it. Things to Do in Naples, FL: Everglades National Park Baker Museum Naples Art Association More Around The Lodge The below is loaded in greatwolf.footer-v2 since it needs to load at the bottom Dining/Events Hours API Great Wolf Lodge is available to host private events of all types. With multiple flexible rooms and more than 15,000 square feet of event space, our Naples, FL resort has your next special occasion covered. View Event Options The below is loaded in greatwolf.footer-v2 since it needs to load at the bottom -Adaptable event spaces for birthdays, weddings, cocktail,receptions, conferences, meetings, and more -A personalized program for groups of any size -Dedicated blocks of suites with easy payment options -Separate event parking and entrance -Full-service customizable catering -Fully integrated A/V and technology options Frequently Asked Questions See All FAQs See All FAQs When does the Great Wolf Lodge in Naples open? Great Wolf Lodge in Naples, FL, is now open. It is the 22nd lodge to join the Great Wolf Lodge water park resort family. What is included in a stay at Great Wolf Lodge? Great Wolf Lodge guests have unlimited access to our 84-degree indoor water park , filled with slides, pools, and more. Guests are also invited to enjoy free daily events and activities , including dance parties, arts and crafts, and story time. Our Adventure Park is also full of attractions available at an additional cost. Parking is not included in the room rate. What are the water park hours at the Great Wolf Lodge in Naples? For water park hours during your stay, please view our Indoor Water Park page . You can access the water park any time after opening on your arrival day and until closing time on your departure day. How much is a water park day pass at the Great Wolf Lodge in Naples? You can enjoy our entire indoor water park at Great Wolf Lodge in Naples, FL with a Day Pass. Please see our Day Pass Page for pricing on both Half Day and Full Day Passes. Passes are free for children ages 2 and under. What's the best age for visiting Great Wolf Lodge? Great Wolf Lodge has something for everyone in the family. Our indoor water park has shallow pools and safe kiddie play areas for toddlers, as well as exciting waterslides for older children and teens. Explore by age on our website to find the best activities and attractions for your family. How far is Great Wolf Lodge from Miami and Tampa, FL? The Great Wolf Lodge water park resort in Naples, FL, is located about two hours west of Miami, FL, and about two hours and a half south of Tampa, FL. Does Great Wolf Lodge have adult water park activities? The water park is designed so there are exciting things to do for all ages. With incredible water slides, a lazy river, wave pool, hot springs, and more, there are adventures at Great Wolf Lodge for adults, teens, and little ones alike. What do adults wear at Great Wolf Lodge? As both the water park and Adventure Park are exciting things to do for adults at Great Wolf Lodge, we recommend parents and other adults pack multiple bathing suits, water-resistant shoes, and comfortable, light clothing. Athleisure or “resort-casual” wear are perfect for your stay at the lodge. What are the hours at the Great Wolf Lodge in Naples? The Great Wolf Lodge in Naples operates 24/7, with certain dining outlets at the resort open late, and water park hours varying by day (please check hours of operation on our Water Park page ). The Great Wolf Lodge Naples staff are available to service you and your family throughout your stay, from the moment of arrival to departure.
